author: Will McClelland
description:
Crypt of the Moon Spider, the first book in the Lunar Gothic Trilogy, was one of my favorite books of 2024. Cathedral of the Drowned has even more entrancing writing, delightfully disturbed characters, eerie horror, and a whole lot more legs, eggs, and mandibles. If you can stomach it, this sequel will be one of […]

The post REVIEW: Cathedral of the Drowned by Nathan Ballingrud appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Cathedral of the Drowned by Nathan Ballingrud
